name: leer
effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Frightens the foe with a leer to lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.emerald: Frightens the foe with a leer to lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is given an intimidating look that lowers its DEFENSE stat.
